name: TestGuestList
description: For a Vyper implementation of this contract containing additional functionality, see https://github.com/banteg/guest-list/blob/master/contracts/GuestList.vy. A basic guest list contract for testing.

functionDecorators.name: authorized
functionDecorators.description: Check if a guest with a bag of a certain size is allowed into the party. Note that `_amount` isn't checked to keep test setup simple, since from the vault tests' perspective this is a pass/fail call anyway.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Not used. The amount of tokens the guest is bringing.

functionDecorators.name: setGuests
functionDecorators.description: Invite guests or kick them from the party.

parameterDecorators.name: _guests
parameterDecorators.description: The guests to add or update.

parameterDecorators.name: _invited
parameterDecorators.description: A flag for each guest at the matching index, inviting or uninviting the guest.
